original_title: When the Birds Sing in the Early Morning/ Cosmic Enlightenment of a Fragile Mind
overview: An experimental double bill. Staring off with the story of a man's existential ramblings of finding true love. Followed by a vague golden age of surrealist film homage about a rock and roll god who lives up on a mountain desperate to live a normal human life.
title: When the Birds Sing in the Early Morning/ Cosmic Enlightenment of a Fragile Mind
